hints.content:
This image shows $\blueE5$ rows with $\purpleD{2}$ in each row.

![5 rows of dots. 2 dots in each row. The rows are labeled 1 through 5 at the left. The columns are labeled 1 and 2 at the top.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ac75aa0b1db6333c98aaa506dc1b10f7ae84ae7e)

This image represents $2+ 2 + 2+2+2$:

![5 rows of dots. 2 dots in each row.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b9838fa3aa7275a95f09fc3cbd76cc8ca7536caa)
